amendment.description: Amendment as modified gives preference to organizations that are located in underrepresented states and regions, or organizations owned by women, service disabled veterans, or minorities when awarding grants for Small Business Administration (SBA) outreach efforts authorized under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-192, as modified to give preference to organizations that are located in under represented states and regions, or are women-, service-disabled veterans- or minority-owned when awarding grants for Small Business Administration (SBA) outreach efforts authorized under Title III (rural development and outreach).

action.text: Reichert amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent. The modification amends the instruction to read as follows: "Page 20, line 1, insert the following new subparagraph and redesignates subparagraphs (B) through (D) on lines 1 through 12 as (C) through (E) respectively.".
On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A004) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
